statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={188.2}{e}^{{{0.0506}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0506}}\approx{1.0519020483005}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0519020483005}-{1}={0.051902048300498}\approx{0.0519} and the percent is 5.19.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
